title: Eternal Love
content:
In your eyes, I see forever,
In your arms, I find my home.
Every beat of my heart whispers your name,
In this love, I'm never alone.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

Yours eternally,
[YOUR NAME]

title: Passionate Verses
content:
Like stars that dance in midnight skies,
Your love illuminates my nights.
With every breath, with every sigh,
My heart beats only for your light.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

Devotedly yours,
[YOUR NAME]
